messages.subject: Langley Homeschoolers Thursday Fieldtrips
messages.msgSnippet: Hi everyone, As you may or may not know, we have posted in the past about our field trips we have put together for homeschoolers in and around the Langley BC
messages.messageBody:
Hi everyone,



As you may or may not know, we have posted in the past about our field trips
we have put together for homeschoolers in and around the Langley BC area.



In an effort to limit the amount of mail sent out to this list, we have set
up an announcement email list on yahoo groups, that you can sign up to and
just get info and announcements about these trips. The URL to sign up is:



langleyfieldtrips-subscribe@yahoogroups.com



There won't be any discussion on this list, it is just to let people know of
cancellations or change of venue etc so there won't be too much volume.



Plus in the near future (maybe even tonight) I will be posting our listed
activities onto a page on my website the URL will be:



http://www.aloeessence.com/fieldtrips



thanks, hope to see you on an upcoming Thursday,



Sherri-Lee

Need safe and natural health products?

http://www.aloeessence.com





[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
